translations: 感谢的，感激的；（表示）感谢（或感激）的

sentences.sentence: I was thankful that he hadn't been hurt.
sentences.translation: 他没有受伤，我感到很欣慰。

sentences.sentence: I was thankful to see they'd all arrived safely.
sentences.translation: 看到他们都平安到达，我感到欣慰。

sentences.sentence: Most of the time I'm just thankful that I've got a job.
sentences.translation: 大部分时候我庆幸自己有了份工作。
